import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/MessageInbox.css';// Optional: for styling
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MessageInbox=_ref=>{let{currentUserId}=_ref;const[conversations,setConversations]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchConversations=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/conversations/".concat(currentUserId));if(res.ok){const data=await res.json();setConversations(data);}else{console.error('Failed to fetch conversations');}}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching conversations:',err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchConversations();},[currentUserId]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading conversations..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inbox-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Conversations"}),conversations.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No conversations yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"conversation-list",children:conversations.map((conv,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/messages/".concat(conv.item_id,"/").concat(conv.other_user_id),children:["Chat with ",conv.other_user_name," about \"",conv.item_title,"\""]})},index))})]});};export default MessageInbox;
